body.p: Headers and footers are added to a PageDef in the page design view.
The default Right PageDef includes two background text frames for header and footer text, and a foreground text frame which is where the document content is placed.

fig.title: Right PageDef showing background and foreground text frames

body.p: Fixed text and placeholder variables (<Var>, <RunningText>, <Date>) can be added to a background text frame by double-clicking to locate the cursor in the background text frame, then right-click to bring up the context menu.

fig.title: Placeholder variables inserted in background text frame
